title: Dark Stage Dataset Row Schema
description: Schema to validate a single data row (an anecdote) within the Dark Stage dataset

period.description: Historical literary period of the author

author_id.description: Unique identifier or name of the author

style.description: Primary writing style of the author

incident_type.description: Category of event (feud, scandal, plagiarism, gossip, etc.)

anecdote.description: Raw anecdotal description of the event

feud_with.description: Other author(s) or group involved in the conflict

notable_rivalry.description: Short label summarizing the rivalry or dramatic event

stage_mood.description: Emoji representing theatrical mood surrounding the event

location.description: Geographical or contextual location of the incident

play_id.description: If related to a specific play, the play identifier (e.g., 'hamlet')

creature_id.description: Link to a supernatural creature in the 'creatures' dataset
